entry.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Tutor, Clinical Skills & Simulation Centre

link.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Tutor, Clinical Skills & Simulation Centre

entry.content:
IMU Education Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Tutor, Clinical Skills & Simulation Centre position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job responsibilites:
  • Teach and assess clinical procedures to IMU students.
  • Assist Clinical Skills & Simulation Centre (CSSC) lecturers in all related matters in CSSC operational scope.
  • Participate in research activities.
  • Responsible for daily operations of skills centre including cleanliness and preparation of physical set-up.
  • Coordinate and assist with academic from other department in the preparation of the physical set-up of OSCE as well as to ensure smooth running of OSCE.
  • Manage inventory and stock including monitoring usage of teaching materials and disposables and procurement of new items.
  • Assist in recruitment and training of real patients and simulated patients.
  • Assist and run both low and high fidelity simulation sessions.
  • Coordinate and run workshop for external participants.
  • Supervise and teach students posted to community clinics (Outpatient department and Maternal & Child health clinics), hospital and patients home visit situated in Klang Valley and Negeri Sembilan.
Job requirements:
  • Minimum Bachelor’s Degree (preferably in Nursing).
  • Any post basic certification is preferred.
  • Master in related field is preferred.
  • Minimum of 5 years working experience.

Company Overview

The International Medical University (IMU) is Malaysia’s first and most established private medical and healthcare university with 27 years of dedicated focus in healthcare education. Established in 1992, the University enjoys an international reputation, and provides a high standard of education at undergraduate, postgraduate and continuing professional development level. Its programmes consist of both local tracks (IMU degree), as well as international partner tracks (partner university degree). 
Product & Services
Medical education and Pharmacy programme

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Kuala Lumpur.
Apply Online
entry.summary: IMU Education Sdn Bhd is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Tutor, Clinical Skills & Simulation Centre which positioned at Kuala Lumpur

entry.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Bahasa (Malay Language) Lecturer

link.title: IMU Education Sdn Bhd Vacancies Bahasa (Malay Language) Lecturer

entry.content:
IMU Education Sdn Bhd is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Bahasa (Malay Language) Lecturer position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Job Responsibilities:
  • To deliver lectures for Bahasa Melayu Komunikasi 2, Bahasa Kebangsaan A and other modules in Malay language
  • Monitor student progress in the module
  • To develop, review and update all lessons in compliance with the syllabus
  • Participate in the development, administration and marking of exams and other assessments
  • To involve in department and university activities 

Requirements:
  • Applicants must possess a Bachelor’s degree in Malay Language with minimum of 3 years teaching experience
  • Must be IT savy person
  • Able to communicate in English
  • Master holders are encourage to apply

Company Overview

The International Medical University (IMU) is Malaysia’s first and most established private medical and healthcare university with 27 years of dedicated focus in healthcare education. Established in 1992, the University enjoys an international reputation, and provides a high standard of education at undergraduate, postgraduate and continuing professional development level. Its programmes consist of both local tracks (IMU degree), as well as international partner tracks (partner university degree). 
Product & Services

entry.title: ELOGIO ASIA PACIFIC SDN. BHD. Vacancies Beauty and Aesthetic Laser Trainer

link.title: ELOGIO ASIA PACIFIC SDN. BHD. Vacancies Beauty and Aesthetic Laser Trainer

entry.content:
ELOGIO ASIA PACIFIC SDN. BHD. is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Beauty and Aesthetic Laser Trainer position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Responsibilities:
  • To develop and implement training strategies and programmes for beauty products, medical equiment and aesthetic laser operation
  • To conduct demonstration in laser operation and other aesthetic equipment.
  • To support field activities organized by company
  • To handle client enquiries
Requirements:
  • Minimum 3 years’ experience in beauty and medical aesthetic industry
  • Knowledgeable in aesthetic laser systems and skincare.
  • With good communication and training presentation skills 
  • Willing to travel to different locations for training purposes
  • Pleasant personality, team player and sales oriented
  • Responsible
  • Good Working Attitude
  • Honest don't hanky panky
  • Punctual

Company Overview

Elogio Asia was incorporated on 28th January 2003. The original intent of starting this company was to provide the aesthetic and beauty market skin care products that really work and beauty equipment that meant to achieve results. At that time, there was a lack of good quality beauty products and aesthetic equipment in the market that work and achieve the desired results for customers. Elogio Asia is constantly looking out for such products and equipment that can enhance the total body wellness and achieving vitality to the body health from top to toe. Elogio Asia positions herself not only as a product distributor in the region but also a beauty and wellness concept provider where we specialize in providing our customers, salon owners and aesthetic doctors, unique concepts and protocols in treating their customers and patients satisfactorily achieving the results they desire. We offer solutions by creating concepts that target the very core problem areas faced by the customers. Elogio Asia seeks to be a trend-setter by engaging in beauty-related research and development so that we can help our customers obtain and achieve optimum results. We are now representative and sole distributor to Asia for some of the best quality and well known products and equipment from United Kingdom, Korea, Spain, Italy and Japan.

Elogio Asia is also a company that instills social responsibility to the society by involving and supporting in community projects. We also inculcate mutual respect amongst staff by listening and caring for one another so as to make the working environment conducive, stress-free and enjoyable. We hope as the Company grows, the staff who is our important and main asset, will also grow with us.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: ELOGIO ASIA PACIFIC SDN. BHD. is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Beauty and Aesthetic Laser Trainer which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Centre Operations Consultant(s)

link.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies Centre Operations Consultant(s)

entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Centre Operations Consultant(s) position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Eduwis Education
Duties and responsibilities:
  • Hire principal for new centres
  • Assist in new centre’s employee hiring
  • Ensure smooth daily operations
  • Monitor principal in preparing annual budget
  • Monitor centre monthly operations budget
  • Report unusual activities within operations, hiring and expenses.
  • Advise centre on centre A&P planning & execution
  • Involve in centre revenue growth KPI setting
  • Ensure centre principal operate the centre based on company SOP
  • Ensure each centre’s revenue growth are met with target set by head of centre operations
  • Prepare each centre’s monthly report
  • Takeover centre operations during emergency situation
Core Competencies & Skills:
  • Expert in all MS Office products (Excel, Word, ..)
  • Good people skills, able to effectively communicate with all levels of staff
  • Good observation skills and detail-oriented person
  • Committed, independent and has high levels of personal integrity
  • Able to work independently, proactively and possess strong analytical skill
  • Self-motivated, result and task oriented with strong work ethics and positive attitude
  • Able and willing to work on weekends
  • Willing to travel
Education Level:
  • At least a Professional Certificate, Diploma in Early Childhood Education, Management, Education, Teaching, Training or equivalence.

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Jora Jobs is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Centre Operations Consultant(s) which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: Company Confidential Vacancies Chief Operating Officer

link.title: Company Confidential Vacancies Chief Operating Officer

entry.content:
Company Confidential is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Chief Operating Officer position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Maintain relationship with government stakeholders including:
  • Ensuring MOHE & KPT and other official documents are kept safe and secure
  • Cooperate with all government agencies before, during and after scheduled/non-scheduled audits
  • Preparing documents for scheduled audits
  • Ensuring all government permits are checked and up-to-date
  • Process all permit renewals according to schedule and update the head office in KL on their status
  • Assist in the application of lecturers teaching permits where necessary
  • Ensure building code is up-to-date and arrange for inspections when necessary
  • Process students’ application for PTPTN, EPF, banks and any other financial disbursements
In-charge of all academic-related activities including:
  • Sourcing, scheduling and managing all classes and teaching staff
  • Maintain the quality of all academic staff via regular feedback from students
  • Ensure all teaching materials are available for staff and students
  • Monitor and upkeep all students’ attendance records
  • Maintain all subjects files, update all COPPA documents, and schedule all examinations
  • Ensure final grades are received and processed according to schedule
  • Ensure students receive their semester results according to schedule
  • Arrange and oversee the proper collection and filing of all academic material including exam papers, assignments and related material
  • Assist students and graduates in all academic matters
  • Process scholarship applications and conduct interviews
  • Manage internship students and their partner locations including:
    1. Follow-up calls to students and providers/supervisors
    2. Visits to internship sites to check on the status and wellbeing of the students
Manage all Human Resource functions including:
  • Vet potential candidates and hire accordingly
  • Provide offer letter to successful applicants
  • Ensure all teaching staff meets the requirements set by MOHE
  • Monitor and check all staff claims are legitimate and above-board
  • Monitor performance and continuously assess suitability
  • Provide guidance, advice and counselling where necessary
  • Initiate corrective measures where necessary
To plan and execute the sales and marketing activities including:
  • Budgeting and forecasts
  • School visits and education expos/fairs
  • Invite potential candidates for counselling sessions
  • Establish and maintain relationships with school counsellors
  • Attract potential candidates through in-house workshops, seminars, talks and other activities
  • Work with current students on marketing programs
  • Build revenue through value-added activities
  • Manage recruitment agents and other external sales channels
  • Conduct fact-finding activities on competitors
  • Propose other revenue-generating programs that will either increase student enrolment or bottom-line
To oversee operational matters including:
  • Maintenance of all office computers and IT related infrastructure
  • Library functions including borrowing and purchase of books and other materials
  • Maintenance of classroom appearance including cleanliness, lighting, air-conditioning and other fixtures
  • To ensure a positive and conducive learning environment and to act on any deficiencies in a timely manner
  • Financial records are kept safe and up-to-date including receipts, invoices, claims and related documents
  • To process any requests for purchase and acquisition including stationery supplies, hardware, furniture and fixtures, etc.
  • To disburse cheques to suppliers, utility providers, students and lecturers and ensure proper filing of documentation
  • Ensure claims are processed in a timely manner to prevent any delays in operations
Oversee student affairs and welfare including:
  • Overseeing and organizing student activities, academic and non-academic
  • Oversee all student clubs and their related activities
  • Organising and conducting workshops and seminars that aim to improve a students’ professional development
  • Work with the head office in KL on annual convocation matters
  • Handle all student complaints and feedback and provide a response within the stipulated timeframe
  • Manage student applications for deferment, withdrawal and leave requests
  • Assess students’ academic progress and provide counselling when needed
JOB REQUIREMENTS
  • Candidate must possess at least a Master's Degree in Business Studies/Administration/Management or equivalent.
  • At least 5 Year(s) of working experience in the related field is required for this position.
  • Preferably Senior Manager specialized in Education or equivalent.

Company Overview

We are at the forefront of the Education Industry for Tourism and Hospitality in Malaysia, comprising certificate, diploma and degree courses. Over the years, our graduates have successfully climbed up the corporate ladders across different industries in hospitality, tourism, entertainment, event, business, finance and many other companies and organizations; locally and internationally.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in George Town.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Company Confidential is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Chief Operating Officer which positioned at George Town

entry.title: Jora Jobs Vacancies English Teacher
entry.content:
Jora Jobs is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for English Teacher position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

Portman College Sdn Bhd
  • Transfer knowledge in an appropriate form.
  • Challenge thinking, foster debate and develop the ability of students to engage in critical discourse and rational thinking.
  • Develop the skills of applying appropriate approaches to teaching.
  • Extend, transform and apply the knowledge acquired from research to teaching and appropriate external activities.
  • Identify learning needs of students and define appropriate learning objectives.
  • Ensure that content, methods of delivery and learning materials will meet the defined learning objectives.
  • Develop own teaching materials, methods and approaches and deliver either across a range of modules or within a subject area.
  • Use appropriate teaching, learning support and assessment methods.
  • Apply innovative and appropriate teaching techniques and material, which create interest, understanding and enthusiasm amongst students.
  • Design, develop and deliver a range of modules of study at various levels.
  • Supervise the work of students – including student projects, field trips and, where appropriate, placements – and provide advice on study skills and help them with learning problems.
  • Select appropriate assessment instruments and criteria and set, mark and assess work and examinations and provide feedback to students.
  • Conduct training for corporate clients, mentor & coach students for achieving their sales targets and KPIs.
  • Act as internal examiner for diploma/degrees.
  • Seek ways of improving performance by reflecting on teaching design and delivery and obtaining and analyzing feedback.
  • Identify areas where current provision is in need of revision or improvement.
  • Contribute to the planning, design and development of objectives and material.
  • Any other tasks assigned by management from time to time.
  • On occasions, for the benefit of the Company you may be required to undertake other duties as required by management.
Experience:
  • Teaching: 1 year (Preferred)

Company Overview

Who are we?
Jora Malaysia is a search engine for jobs throughout Malaysia.
Unlike traditional job boards, users can search through thousands of career opportunities, all sourced from many job sites from around Malaysia. 
This Job Ad is one of the carefully selected pick from the clients of Jora Malaysia.
Your application will be redirected to them.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Selangor.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Jora Jobs is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the English Teacher which positioned at Selangor

entry.title: Divo Academy Vacancies Graphic Design Lecturer ()

link.title: Divo Academy Vacancies Graphic Design Lecturer ()

entry.content:
Divo Academy is looking for new potential candidates to fill in for Graphic Design Lecturer () position. If you currently looking for new education sector job opportunities and qualified with the job desc, feel free to apply this job.

Job Description

We are currently looking to hire a Mandarin speaking lecturer for our academy. If you are a Senior lecturer in digital multimedia you can explore your chances with us.
 
Who are we looking for?
  • Undertake teaching and teaching-related duties such as design; prepare and develop teaching materials
  • Plan and implement teaching strategies to optimise learning and to motivate students

What do you need to have?
  • Candidate must possess at least Advanced Diploma, Degree in Art/Design/Creative Multimedia or equivalent.
  • At least 2 year of working experience in the related field
  • Proficiency in motion graphics, video production, 3D or graphic design.
  • Good presentation skill in English, Bahasa Malaysia and Mandarin as the role requires you to conduct classes using Mandarin language.
What are the benefits waiting for you?
  • Attractive remuneration package
  • Annual performance Bonus
Are you ready to make that career shift? Click on that ‘Apply Now’ button and we will talk to you soon.

Company Overview

DIVO Academy is located in Muar , specializing in multimedia design program also promoting Chinese - English bilingual education. Since the nation is growing rapidly with new technology, our lessons are 80% computer related with the latest software.
DIVO Academy believe the important of competence development and literacy to educate generations. Therefore our education mission is to train students  not only with course knowledge but also 4C 1P that are Communication, Computer Skill, Confidence, Creative & Innovation and Presentation.

How To Apply

If you confident and feel that this job is suitable to you, go ahead take your action now.
Hope you find your dream education sector job in Muar.
Apply Online
entry.summary: Divo Academy is currently looking for suitable person to fill in the Graphic Design Lecturer () which positioned at Muar
